properties.name: storage.directory
properties.description: Local file system directory for storing application files (images, audio, documents)

properties.name: langsmith.enabled
properties.description: Enable LangSmith tracing for AI operations monitoring

properties.name: langsmith.apiKey
properties.description: API key for LangSmith tracing service

properties.name: langsmith.apiUrl
properties.description: Base URL for LangSmith API endpoints

properties.name: langsmith.project
properties.description: LangSmith project name for organizing traced operations

properties.name: google.ai.apiKey
properties.description: API key for Google AI services including Imagen image generation

properties.name: google.ai.baseUrl
properties.description: Base URL for Google AI API endpoints

properties.name: openai.baseUrl
properties.description: Base URL for OpenAI API endpoints
